title: High Ping only in League
body: Every other game I play I get a consistent 20 - 40 ping, but whenever I play league my ping is consistently 80 - 120. I live in San Diego and am using AT&T U verse as my service provider.

replies.body: This isn't entirely uncommon as your connection speeds can vary from server to server. Some games may have a much better connection due to better ISP routing, or it could in fact only be happening from less than optimal router settings as well. Try adjusting your port forwarding and DNS settings as some basic troubleshooting, which if you're not sure how to do so you can find those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
